MTM.Summary: Engaging with AI and blockchain in NYC.

LTM.Lessons: Importance of time management, seeking help, balancing priorities

LTM.Milestone: Took a leave of absence from NYU to join a quant firm.

LTM.Lessons: Importance of seizing opportunities, balancing academic and professional growth, following intuition.

LTM.Milestone: Lost job and pivoted to crypto.

LTM.Implications: Opens doors to new opportunities in tech.

short_term.goal: Attend 3 industry-specific networking events in NYC to expand professional network and explore investment opportunities.
Complete an online course on AI application in finance and blockchain technology.

long_term: Establish a personal investment fund focused on AI and blockchain startups, leveraging insights and connections gained from networking and educational pursuits.
